extends ICalculator
    Interface for particle pair interaction calculator
    Author:
    Achim Zielesny

    • Method Detail

      • calculateParticlePairInteractions

        boolean calculateParticlePairInteractions​(double[] aR_x,
                                          double[] aR_y,
                                          double[] aR_z,
                                          Parameters aParameters,
                                          ParticlePairInteractionCalculator.CellBasedCalculationMode aCalculationMode)
        Calculates particle pair interactions with a distance smaller than cut-off length based on calculation mode. NOTE: No checks are performed. NOTE: This method scales linearly with the number of particles.
        Parameters:
        aR_x - Current x-components of particle positions in simulation box
        aR_y - Current y-components of particle positions in simulation box
        aR_z - Current z-components of particle positions in simulation box
        aParameters - Parameters
        aCalculationMode - Calculation mode
        Returns:
        True: Operation successful, false: Otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if calculation mode is unknown

      • setParticlePairDistanceParametersCacheActivity

        void setParticlePairDistanceParametersCacheActivity​(boolean aValue)
        Sets activity of cache for ParticlePairDistanceParameterss
        Parameters:
        aValue - True: Cache for ParticlePairDistanceParameterss is active, false: Otherwise

      • getParticlePairDistanceParametersCacheActivity

        boolean getParticlePairDistanceParametersCacheActivity()

                                int[] aNextParticleIndexOfCellArray)
        Set particle assignments (e.g. for call of method this.calculateCellBasedParticlePairInteractionsWithCurrentParticleCellAssignments()) NOTE: NO checks are performed.
        Parameters:
        aHeadParticleIndexOfCellArray - Head particle index of cell array (retrieved with corresponding getter)
        aNextParticleIndexOfCellArray - Next particle index of cell array (retrieved with corresponding getter)

        Parameters:
        aParticlePairInteractionCalculator - Particle pair interaction calculator whose head particle index of cell array and next particle index of cell array are transferred
